summary: This Bash script pipes data from xwd.dump to pypy3 for execution of pypy_xwd.py, then passes the output to python3's unpickle.py, ensuring efficient processing and data extraction.

details.comment: This Bash script pipes data from xwd.dump to pypy3 for execution of pypy_xwd.py, then passes the output to python3's unpickle.py, ensuring efficient processing and data extraction.
